title: How to Own Your Friends at Super Smash Brothers

steps.headline: Practice until you become really good.
steps.description: Using some form of netplay (Anther's Ladder, For Glory) will help you gradually improve. Also, try all Level 9 CPU battles, to see the techniques they use and try to imitate them.

steps.headline: Save or record some of your matches.
steps.description: This will allow you to be able to examine your mistakes as well as to be able to observe what's working.

steps.headline: Practice with different characters until you are comfortable.
steps.description: Then attempt to more or less stick with that character.

steps.headline: Accept all challengers.
steps.description: Letting them battle against you will allow you to learn from what's personally effective for themselves.

text: Practice until you become really good. Using some form of netplay (Anther's Ladder, For Glory) will help you gradually improve. Also, try all Level 9 CPU battles, to see the techniques they use and try to imitate them. Save or record some of your matches. This will allow you to be able to examine your mistakes as well as to be able to observe what's working. Practice with different characters until you are comfortable. Then attempt to more or less stick with that character. Accept all challengers. Letting them battle against you will allow you to learn from what's personally effective for themselves.
